pricing.title: Choose Your Perfect Plan
pricing.subtitle: Unlock the full potential of PadelGraph with our premium features. Start free and upgrade anytime to access advanced analytics, unlimited tournaments, and exclusive community features.

subscriptionFailed.title: Subscription Failed

questions.question: Can I change my plan anytime?
questions.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately, and we'll prorate any charges.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and PayPal for subscription payments.

questions.question: Is there a free trial for premium plans?
questions.answer: Our Free plan lets you explore PadelGraph risk-free. Upgrade anytime to unlock advanced features.

questions.question: How do tournament limits work?
questions.answer: Tournament creation limits reset monthly. If you need more, you can upgrade to a higher plan anytime.

about.title: About PadelGraph
about.subtitle: We're building the ultimate social network for padel players around the world. Connect, compete, and grow your game with a community that shares your passion.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To create the world's most comprehensive padel platform where players of all levels can connect, compete, and improve their game through data-driven insights and a vibrant community.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.text: A world where every padel player has access to professional-grade analytics, meaningful connections with fellow enthusiasts, and opportunities to compete and grow—regardless of skill level or location.

rankings.title: Real-Time Rankings
rankings.description: Comprehensive ranking system that tracks your performance across matches and tournaments. See exactly where you stand and watch your progress over time.

social.title: Social Network
social.description: Connect with players worldwide, share highlights, and build your padel community. Follow your favorite players and clubs.

tournaments.title: Tournaments
tournaments.description: Create, join, and track tournaments with various formats. From casual club events to competitive championships, all in one place.

cta.title: Join the Movement
cta.text: Become part of the fastest-growing padel community in the world. Start tracking your progress and connecting with players today.

contact.title: Questions?
contact.text: We'd love to hear from you. Reach out to our team anytime.

leaderboard.emptyState: No players in this leaderboard yet

hero.title: The Ultimate Social Network for Padel Players
hero.subtitle: Play Better. Connect Smarter. Level Up Your Game.
hero.description: Struggling to find players at your level or track your progress? Most padel enthusiasts have no way to measure performance, connect with rivals, or manage court bookings—until now.

solution.title: PadelGraph is the All-in-One Solution
solution.subtitle: Whether you're casual or competitive, this is your padel hub

rankings.title: Real-Time Rankings
rankings.description: Individual and doubles rankings updated live. Track your performance and see where you stand against the competition.

connect.title: Connect by Level & Location
connect.description: Find players at your skill level nearby. Connect with rivals, book matches, and grow your padel network.

social.title: Social Feed
social.description: Share match highlights, photos, and videos. Follow your favorite players and clubs for the latest updates.

management.title: Club & Court Management
management.description: Integrated booking system for clubs. Reserve courts, manage availability, and organize your game sessions.

tournaments.title: Live Tournaments
tournaments.description: Track tournaments in real-time. Participate, follow scores, and celebrate victories with the community.

analytics.title: Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Deep stats and insights. Understand your strengths, improve weaknesses, and level up your game.

howItWorks.title: Get Started in Minutes
howItWorks.subtitle: Three simple steps to join the community

step1.title: Create Your Profile
step1.description: Sign up and set your skill level, location, and playing preferences

step2.title: Connect & Play
step2.description: Find players, book courts, and start competing in tournaments

step3.title: Track Your Progress
step3.description: Watch your ranking rise as you play more and improve your game

cta.title: Ready to Level Up Your Padel Game?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of players improving their game and growing their network with PadelGraph
